com.ulticraft.uapi.composite

Class Area

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ulticraft.uapi.composite.Area

  • public class Area
extends Object
    Used to Create an instance of a spherical area based on a central location Great for efficiently checking if an entity is within a spherical area.
    Author:
    cyberpwn

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Area(org.bukkit.Location location, Double radius)
      Used to instantiate a new "area" in which you can check if entities are within this area.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Double distance(org.bukkit.Location location)
      Calculate the ESTIMATED distance from the center of this area, to the given location WARNING: This uses newton's method, be careful on how accurate you need this.
      org.bukkit.Location getLocation()
      Get the defined center location
      org.bukkit.entity.Entity[] getNearbyEntities()
      Get ALL entities within the area.
      org.bukkit.entity.Player[] getNearbyPlayers()
      Get all players within the area.
      Double getRadius()
      Gets the area's radius
      boolean isWithin(org.bukkit.Location location)
      Check to see weather a location is within the area
      void setLocation(org.bukkit.Location location)
      Set the defined center location
      void setRadius(Double radius)
      Set the area's radius
      Double slowDistance(org.bukkit.Location location)
      Calculate the EXACT distance from the center of this area, to the given location WARNING: This uses the sqrt function, be careful on how heavy you call this.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Area

        public Area(org.bukkit.Location location,
            Double radius)
        Used to instantiate a new "area" in which you can check if entities are within this area.
        Parameters:
        location - The center location of the area
        radius - The radius used as a double.

    • Method Detail

      • distance

        public Double distance(org.bukkit.Location location)
        Calculate the ESTIMATED distance from the center of this area, to the given location WARNING: This uses newton's method, be careful on how accurate you need this. As it is meant for FAST calculations with minimal load.
        Parameters:
        location - The given location to calculate a distance from the center.
        Returns:
        Returns the distance of location from the center.

      • slowDistance

        public Double slowDistance(org.bukkit.Location location)
        Calculate the EXACT distance from the center of this area, to the given location WARNING: This uses the sqrt function, be careful on how heavy you call this.
        Parameters:
        location - The given location to calculate a distance from the center.
        Returns:
        Returns the distance of location from the center.

      • isWithin

        public boolean isWithin(org.bukkit.Location location)
        Check to see weather a location is within the area
        Parameters:
        location - The location to measure from the center.
        Returns:
        Returns True if within; False if not.

      • getNearbyEntities

        public org.bukkit.entity.Entity[] getNearbyEntities()
        Get ALL entities within the area. NOTE: This is EVERY entity, not just LivingEntities. Drops, Particles, Mobs, Players, Everything
        Returns:
        Returns an Entity[] array of all entities within the given area.

      • getNearbyPlayers

        public org.bukkit.entity.Player[] getNearbyPlayers()
        Get all players within the area.
        Returns:
        Returns an Player[] array of all players within the given area.

      • getLocation

        public org.bukkit.Location getLocation()
        Get the defined center location
        Returns:
        Returns the center location of the area

      • setLocation

        public void setLocation(org.bukkit.Location location)
        Set the defined center location
        Parameters:
        location - The new location to be set

      • getRadius

        public Double getRadius()
        Gets the area's radius
        Returns:
        Returns the area's radius

      • setRadius

        public void setRadius(Double radius)
        Set the area's radius
        Parameters:
        radius - The new radius to be set
